Improvements.Description: The code is checking multiple conditions to decide if a node is visible or not. These conditions can be extracted into a helper method named `isNodeVisible` that takes a `Node` and `WebWindow` as parameters. This will make the code more readable and maintainable.

Instead of using multiple if conditions to check if visibility is 'visible', 'hidden', or 'collapse', we can add these to a List and use `List.contains()` method to check. This will make the code cleaner and more efficient.
